name: Zenith 125 Toggle Table
descr:
125-Zenith Toggle

Standard Features:

Five Year Limited Parts Warranty
Terminal Point Drop Toggle Mechanism 
Dual Tension Adjusts from Either Side
Universal Headraiser-Raises & Lowers 
Cervical Headpiece Tilts 
Firm Mastoid Support 
Durable Chrome Plated Base
Contoured Body Cushion 
Sensation Upholstery

Table Specifications:
Length 73”
Heights Available 13", 15", or 17"
Cushion Width 23”
Weight 96 lbs.
